events.message: Customer reported an auto accident involving a rear-end collision with significant vehicle damage.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident due to keywords indicating a vehicle collision scenario.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to the case to ensure timely processing of the auto accident claim.
The insurance company sent an official acknowledgment to the customer confirming receipt of the auto accident claim.
Requested police report, photographs of vehicle damage, and driverâ€™s license to proceed with the investigation.
The customer submitted all requested documents including police report and photos showing the extent of damages.
Claims investigator began reviewing submitted evidence and contacted involved parties for further details.
Investigation concluded that the collision was caused by the third party, confirming validity of the customer's claim.
A settlement offer was proposed based on damage assessments and repair cost estimates provided by authorized garages.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the promptness of the proposed settlement and transparency in communication.
Final approval was granted for the auto accident claim after confirming all documentation and customer agreement.
Payment for the approved settlement was issued promptly to the customer's account to cover vehicle repair expenses.
The claim was officially closed after payment issuance and confirmation that all customer concerns were addressed.
All documents and case files were archived securely for future reference and regulatory compliance.
